    ag5Tools

    ag5Tools.Rmd

    CDSAPI Installation

    To download AgERA5 data from the Copernicus Climate Data Store (CDS) you should first follow the steps described on the CDS API Guide to install the Python CDSAPI.

    Downloading AgERA5 data

    The following example downloads varaible “2m_temperature”. For this variable there seven statistics available:

    • 24_hour_maximum

    • 24_hour_mean

    • 24_hour_minimum

    • day_time_maximum

    • day_time_mean

    • night_time_mean

    • night_time_minimum

    In this case, we will download “night_time_minimum”. You should replace the target path to a location in your own computer where you want to store the downloaded data.

    library(ag5Tools)

ag5_download(variable = "2m_temperature",
            statistic = "night_time_minimum",
            day = "all",
            month = "all",
            year = 2015,
            path = "C:/custom_target_folder")
